disable.comment: This allows a filter to be applied to the data to look for exception data (i.e. invalid data)
disable.comment2: If ECU doesnâ€™t receive sensor information, data will be 32767
disable.title: Disable Object

filter.comment: This allows a filter to be applied to the data to look for exception data (i.e. invalid data)
filter.comment2: In this instance if the sensor reads 32766 then it is in an open state
filter.title: Open State

disable.comment: If this evaluates to true then the entry will be disabled. Note that this reads from the config file
disable.title: Off Grid

disable.comment: Used to enable indications related to 3 phase generators. Note that this reads from the config file
disable.title: Single Phase

status.title: Line
status.comment: The 'container' modifier will allow the values to be displayed with some hierarchy

status.title: Engine
status.comment: The 'container' modifier will allow the values to be displayed with some hierarchy

status.title: Generator
status.comment: The 'container' modifier will allow the values to be displayed with some hierarchy

status.title: Inputs
status.comment: The 'container' modifier will allow the values to be displayed with some hierarchy
status.comment2: You can change the title to indicate the input's funtion or remove unused inputs

status.title: Outputs
status.comment: The 'container' modifier will allow the values to be displayed with some hierarchy
status.comment2: You can change the title to indicate the output's funtion or remove unused outputs

maintenance.comment: This entry is for displaying the run hours
maintenance.title: Engine Run Time

maintenance.comment: This entry is for displaying the number of engine starts
maintenance.title: Engine Starts

maintenance.comment: This entry is for displaying the total energy produced
maintenance.title: Total Energy Produced

maintenance.comment: This entry is for displaying the software release info
maintenance.title: Controller Software Release Date

buttons.title: Gen Open/Gen Toggle
buttons.comment: For HGM4010, OPENS Generator output.  For HGM4020, This TOGGLES Generator output.

buttons.title: Gen Close/Mains Toggle
buttons.comment: For HGM4010, CLOSES Generator output.  For HGM4020, This TOGGLES Mains output.

datetime.comment: This entry is for displaying the time in a format similar to how genmon displays the system time of the system running genmon.
datetime.title: Generator Time

settime.comment: the settime object, if present can enable writing of the date and time to the controller
settime.comment2: the 'command_sequence' list is required. It defines the registers and what to write to each register
settime.comment3: The hour,minute,month,date,year entries are like the 'exec' entries in that they are python code that
settime.comment4: format the date and time input into the formate expected in the modbus register.
settime.comment5: If multiple entries are in one register command object, the values will be logical OR'ed to create a single value
settime.comment6: Fixme! This isn't working and I'm not sure if it ever will

command_sequence.comment: This will take a four digit year and only use the lower two digits as low byte
This will write the day of the month

maintenance_due.comment: This should only return a value if maintenance is due, otherwise evaluate to nothing.
maintenance_due.title: Maintenance Due

basestatus.information: The basestatus entry must return one of the following:
basestatus.information2: ALARM, SERVICEDUE, EXERCISING, RUNNING, RUNNING-MANUAL, OFF, MANUAL or  READY
basestatus.information3:: if multiple conditions exist, only the first that is true will be returned
basestatus.title: Base Status

basestatus.comment: Returning Unknown default in the UI to READY
basestatus.title: Base Status

run_hours.comment: This entry is for displaying the run hours in the service journal page. It must return an int or float
run_hours.title: Engine Run Time
